name: VolleyArt-1st edition
description:
This is VolleyArt, in this game you will have to play volleyball against a friend in a 1v1 local game. The rules are simple control versions of your favourite american artists and hit the ball with your head until it is on the other side of the map. And one more thing just be careful with the falling statues that will fall from the sky, they could hurt you.

Hope you enjoy the game 😁

Created by HFXD y Germán Godoy

Presented to the SAAM museum GameJam
